name: Sule Smith
title: Mechanical Engineer
summary: I'm a seasoned mechanical engineer passionate about tackling challenges and driving innovation. Proficient in CAD and design software, I excel at turning concepts into tangible solutions. With a collaborative approach, I thrive on teamwork and communication across diverse backgrounds. Eager to stay abreast of new technologies, I'm committed to personal and professional growth. Excited to further contribute value and innovation to the company.

education.institution: Southern Taiwan University of Science and Technology

description: Gained knowledge of semiconductor processes including PVD, CVD, and ALD.
Gained hands-on experience with advanced semiconductor coating techniques.
Integrated applied STEM projects to enhance English learning.
Organized and coordinated events for customers with the institute staff.
Maintained clear communication with students and parents on progress.
Proficient in SolidWorks, with expertise in 3D modeling and engineering drawings for seamless manufacturing.
Experienced in PLC programming and control logic design for industrial automation.
Skilled in maintaining and troubleshooting jobsite machinery to reduce downtime and boost efficiency.
Solved problems effectively both independently and in teams.
Maintained a friendly, punctual, and hardworking attitude.
Efficiently assembled and disassembled all showroom furniture.
